channel.title: Failed when compiling
channel.description:
Everytime when I trying to run a script this happens:
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
I think I didn't do it right so I write here what I do:
Frist I open runescape and go in my account. Then I start scar cde 2 and I write something script what I found in foorums in that. Then I press press that button what looks laik aim and it does that User specified a new RS window. Then I pick colour in copper rock when Im using powerminer. I click on that green button and WHPOOM there is that Failed when compiling text. What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Failed when compiling
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Doesn’t matter either way.

Read full topic

item.title: Failed when compiling
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

Backslashes for local files, forward slashes for browsers.

Read full topic

item.title: Failed when compiling
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/fighting.scar}

i think thats what it is if you download it
if it doesnt work message me or something

Read full topic

item.title: Failed when compiling
item.dc:creator: @Mippo Mippo
item.description:
@Mippo wrote:

Ok, Im going to download it thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Failed when compiling
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

See it says Something does not exist?

It means that you are missing some files.

You are missing SRL files, or the SRL include as it is better know.

villu-reborn.com to download SRL

Read full topic
